archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.4.5e: e) follow the organisation's process for resolving software and hardware support issues (e.g. to contact a dedicated support team or helpdesk within the organisation, and not to give up the device to an external party or reveal passwords to them).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
